content: परिक्री {c9c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To buy; संभोगाय परिक्रीतः कर्तास्मि तव नाप्रियं <ls>Bk. 8. 78.</ls> {@--2@} To hire, purchase for a time (with <ab>instr.</ab> or <ab>dat.</ab> of the price at which one is employed on stipulated wages); शतेन शताय वा परिक्रीतः <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--3@} To return, requite, repay; कृतेनोपकृतं वायोः परिक्रीणानमुत्थितं <ls>Bk. 8. 8.</ls>
